title: Bitcoin Dominance Hits Cycle High as Market Shows Bearish Signals
summary: Bitcoin dominance has reached a new cycle high while critical indicators suggest broader market stress, with Ethereum unwinding from overleveraged futures positions despite initial ETF optimism. Market liquidity is drying up and stablecoin flows are retreating, with both BTC and ETH showing shifts from bullish to bearish trends as key technical support levels are being tested.
